column4: Anyone know how to get a tv tuner card working?  Its a Pixelview tv pro 3 card using the bt878 chipset.  I got a picture and no sound originally and now I have sound and no picture.
i hat a bttv card and it always worked without any parametes (autodetect) are you sure you need these?
I got this card specifically because it is supposed to work well. I could try removing the module stuff, but it didn't work out of the box either originally.
